Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
Support for testing Spring WebFlux server endpoints via WebTestClient.

    WebTestClient.BodyContentSpec
    WebTestClient.ResponseSpec.expectBody()
    Consume and decode the response body to byte[] and then apply assertions on the raw content (for example, isEmpty, JSONPath, etc.).
    default WebTestClient.BodyContentSpec
    WebTestClient.BodyContentSpec.json(String expectedJson)
    Parse the expected and actual response content as JSON and perform a comparison verifying that they contain the same attribute-value pairs regardless of formatting with lenient checking (extensible and non-strict array ordering).
